name: gale-wings

effect.sun-moon: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.

short_effect: Raises flying moves' priority by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is full.

flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is full.
